text: Ira Demon Brown is a Japanese basketball player from USA. Brown competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Ira BROWN He was born on 3 August 1982.Ira Brown == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Japanese basketball players Category:Olympians for the United States Category:People from Corsicana, Texas Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Ira Brown
